page.title: 17CLUBS AND PASTIMES
page.content: Children made a list of the clubs and societies within the area to which they or someone in their family belonged:- Cubs,Brownies,Beavers,Scouts,Guides, Choir,Girl's Brigade,Boy's Brigade, Swimming,Karate,Judo,Majorettes,Gym Club,Football,Boxing,Fishing,Sports Club,Dancing Classes,Pony Club,Youth Club,Euro Club,Badminton,Keep Fit, Floral Society,Young Wives,Mothers Union,Towns Women's Club. {AFTER SCHOOL} Lots of us like riding BMX bikes. We do tricks like wheelies and bunny-hops on them. I like break dancing. Lots of children in our class play an instrument. Most of us listen to music and read comics. A lot of children have their own computers.
